- 2 -
The Executive Committee is empowered to select an executive
secretary, whose duties shall be defined by the Committee*
Article 4
Duties of Officers:
The duties of the officers shall be those usually pertaining
to Buch offices, and such additional duties as are outlined in the
by-laws.
Article 5
Quorum:
(a) A majority of the Executive Committee shall constitute a
quorum, thereof.
(b) A majority of the active members in good standing shall
constitute a quorum at the annual meeting, or at such special meet¬
ings as may be called by the Executive Committee*
(c) Active members may vote by proxy, provided there is not a
quorum present. It shall be the duty of the Executive Committee to
allot the number of proxies to the respective districts in such &
manner as to constitute a quorum.
Article 6
By-laws:
The by-laws of this Association may be adopted and amended by
a majority vote of the Executive Committee.
Article 7
Amendments:
This constitution may be amended by a two-thirds vote of the
active membership. Notice of any proposed amendment shall be sub¬
mitted to the membership at least thirty days prior to the date of
voting.
